description:
Lounging around the house should be as cozy as being wrapped in a blanket and these PJ pants are the answer. With woven flannel fabric and a relaxed fit, you’ll be finding excuses to stay home.

  • Made with a woven flannel fabric to get you to the next level of cozy
  • Elastic waistband with a drawstring gives you effortless adjustability
  • OEKO-TEX 100 certified fabric adds confidence that what's next to your skin is made with the utmost care
  • Relaxed fit and straight leg, make this something you won’t want to change out of
name: Kari Traa Kari PJ Pants - Women's
